name: seasonal_advanced_team_statistics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool basketball_data. Tool description: Broadage Basketball API can deliver any type of data for a basketball match, tournament or team; including livescores, play-by-play, boxscore, match statistics & many more. Our Basketball Coverage includes 100+ tournaments from all around the world with in-depth coverage, giving you the opportunity to present the best sports data to users located anywhere.
This is a limited version in RapidApi. Please, click here to start your Free Trial and try the endpoints with live data now! API description: Provides the season-wide advanced team statistics with home team / away team filters. **The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

matchid.description: The ID of the basketball match for which to retrieve the statistics.
